ne4:1.4: Assadam adinavam nissaranam phalam upayam anattim.
ne4:1.5: “Dhammam vo, bhikkhave, desessami adikalyanam majjhekalyanam pariyosanakalyanam sattham sabyanjanam kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakasessami”ti.
ne4:24.1: Tattha bhagava ugghatitannussa puggalassa nissaranam desayati, vipancitannussa puggalassa adinavanca nissarananca desayati, neyyassa puggalassa assadanca adinavanca nissarananca desayati.
ne4:25.2: Tanhacarito mando satindriyena dukkhaya patipadaya dandhabhinnaya niyyati satipatthanehi nissayehi.
ne4:25.3: Tanhacarito udattho samadhindriyena dukkhaya patipadaya khippabhinnaya niyyati jhanehi nissayehi.
ne4:25.4: Ditthicarito mando viriyindriyena sukhaya patipadaya dandhabhinnaya niyyati sammappadhanehi nissayehi.
ne4:25.5: Ditthicarito udatto pannindriyena sukhaya patipadaya khippabhinnaya niyyati saccehi nissayehi.
ne4:26.1: Ubho tanhacarita samathapubbangamaya vipassanaya niyyanti ragaviragaya cetovimuttiya.
ne4:26.2: Ubho ditthicarita vipassanapubbangamena samathena niyyanti avijjaviragaya pannavimuttiya.
ne4:27.1: Tattha ye samathapubbangamahi patipadahi niyyanti, te nandiyavattena nayena hatabba, ye vipassanapubbangamahi patipadahi niyyanti, te sihavikkilitena nayena hatabba.
ne4:28.1: Svayam haro kattha sambhavati, yassa sattha va dhammam desayati annataro va garutthaniyo sabrahmacari, so tam dhammam sutva saddham patilabhati.
ne4:28.2: Tattha ya vimamsa ussahana tulana upaparikkha, ayam sutamayi panna.
ne4:28.3: Tatha sutena nissayena ya vimamsa tulana upaparikkha manasanupekkhana, ayam cintamayi panna.
ne4:28.4: Imahi dvihi pannahi manasikarasampayuttassa yam nanam uppajjati dassanabhumiyam va bhavanabhumiyam va, ayam bhavanamayi panna.
ne4:29.3: Yam parato ca ghosena paccattasamutthitena ca yonisomanasikarena nanam uppajjati, ayam bhavanamayi panna.
ne4:29.4: Yassa ima dve panna atthi sutamayi cintamayi ca, ayam ugghatitannu.
ne4:29.5: Yassa sutamayi panna atthi, cintamayi natthi, ayam vipancitannu.
ne4:29.6: Yassa neva sutamayi panna atthi na cintamayi, ayam neyyo.
ne4:30.2: Cattari saccani dukkham samudayam nirodham maggam.
ne4:30.3: Adinavo ca phalanca dukkham, assado samudayo, nissaranam nirodho, upayo anatti ca maggo.
ne4:31.2: “idam dukkhan”ti me, bhikkhave, baranasiyam isipatane migadaye anuttaram dhammacakkam pavattitam appativattiyam samanena va brahmanena va devena va marena va brahmuna va kenaci va lokasmim, sabbam dhammacakkam.
ne4:32.1: Tattha aparimana pada, aparimana akkhara, aparimana byanjana, aparimana akara nerutta niddesa.
ne4:32.2: Etasseva atthassa sankasana pakasana vivarana vibhajana uttanikammam pannatti, itipidam dukkham ariyasaccam.
ne4:33.1: “Ayam dukkhasamudayo”ti me, bhikkhave, baranasiyam isipatane migadaye anuttaram dhammacakkam pavattitam …pe…
ne4:33.3: “ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada”ti me, bhikkhave, baranasiyam isipatane migadaye anuttaram dhammacakkam pavattitam appativattiyam samanena va brahmanena va devena va marena va brahmuna va kenaci va lokasmim.
ne4:34.1: Tattha aparimana pada, aparimana akkhara, aparimana byanjana, aparimana akara nerutta niddesa.
ne4:34.2: Etasseva atthassa sankasana pakasana vivarana vibhajana uttanikammam pannatti itipidam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada ariyasaccam.
ne4:35.1: Tattha bhagava akkharehi sankaseti, padehi pakaseti, byanjanehi vivarati, akarehi vibhajati, niruttihi uttanikaroti, niddesehi pannapeti.
ne4:35.2: Tattha bhagava akkharehi ca padehi ca ugghateti, byanjanehi ca akarehi ca vipancayati, niruttihi ca niddesehi ca vitthareti.
ne4:35.3: Tattha ugghatana adi, vipancana majjhe, vittharana pariyosanam.
ne4:35.4: Soyam dhammavinayo ugghatiyanto ugghatitannupuggalam vineti, tena nam ahu “adikalyano”ti.
ne4:35.5: Vipanciyanto vipancitannupuggalam vineti, tena nam ahu “majjhekalyano”ti.
ne4:35.6: Vitthariyanto neyyam puggalam vineti, tena nam ahu “pariyosanakalyano”ti.
ne4:36.1: Tattha chappadani attho sankasana pakasana vivarana vibhajana uttanikammam pannatti, imani chappadani attho.
ne4:36.2: Chappadani byanjanam akkharam padam byanjanam akaro nirutti niddeso, imani chappadani byanjanam.
ne4:36.3: Tenaha bhagava “dhammam vo, bhikkhave, desessami adikalyanam majjhekalyanam pariyosanakalyanam sattham sabyanjanan”ti.
ne4:37.3: Parisuddhanti nimmalam sabbamalapagatam pariyodatam upatthitam sabbavisesanam, idam vuccati tathagatapadamitipi tathagatanisevitamitipi tathagataranjitamitipi, ato cetam brahmacariyam pannayati.
